Join module¶

class useCases.room.Join.Join¶

Bases: object

Class to join user in the room

static response(user, server, args) → entities.User.User¶

Performs the insertion of an user in the room :param server: IP where the server will be allocated :param args: args to join in the room :returns: user obj with the changes
